HomePage.description: With this application, you can upload technical manuals and use an AI assistant that provides targeted answers from the uploaded documents. Perfect for quickly obtaining precise information about machines, controls, and technical processes—all in one place.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Welcome back! Here's your account overview.

emailVerification.description: Please verify your email address to access all features.

profilInfo.title: Profile Information
profilInfo.description: Your account details and current status

Warnings.success: ✅ PDF uploaded and attached to the assistant

WaitingApproval.title: Account awaiting approval
WaitingApproval.description: Your account has been successfully created and is awaiting administrator approval before you can access the dashboard.
WaitingApproval.step1: Submit your details; the admin will verify the request.
WaitingApproval.step2: You will receive an email notification when your account is approved.
WaitingApproval.step3: Until then, you can check the status or log out.
WaitingApproval.note: If it takes too long, contact your administrator or check your spam folder for the confirmation email.

Responde.aprobat: Your account has been approved. Redirect...
